Detailed Description

A word definition request.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithDictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary
partsOfSpeech: (NSSet *)  partsOfSpeech
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Initialize a new dictionary definition request.

Parameters:
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult, or nil if all available dictionaries should be consulted.
partsOfSpeechThe parts of speech for which definitions should be returned, or nil if all definitions should be returned.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of definitions to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available definitions.
+ (id) requestWithDictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary

Create and initialize a new dictionary definition request.

Parameters:
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult.
+ (id) requestWithDictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Create and initialize a new dictionary definition request with the provided maximum result count.

All available definitions, within to the supplied result limit, will be returned.

Parameters:
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of definitions to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available definitions.
+ (id) requestWithDictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary
partsOfSpeech: (NSSet *)  partsOfSpeech
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Create and initialize a new dictionary definition request.

Parameters:
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult.
partsOfSpeechThe parts of speech for which definitions should be returned, or nil if all definitions should be returned.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of definitions to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available definitions.
